data.message:
You really think 
with the mindset you have 
you deserve to be happy 
no you deserve to be mad 
lonely and thirsty about 500 pounds 
Homeless and hungry
In the streets of downtown
I've used up all my patience
So ive brought the saw with the chainses
And this Santa clause faggot
Is getting shredded up with your faces
But gwan tell me more 
bout your a queen I'm the lord 
and my tongue is the sword
And your all fucking whores
Spoiled brat bitches
Yeah you look good wit no clothes
But other than that bitch your hideous
from your head to your toes
Pledge allegiance to what?
Nah I hang flags upside down
Thank you who bitch for what
Your filthfrik god is a clown
So bitch drop down bitch drop down
Bitch drop down bitch drop down
And grindeth thy knees 
In the glass as you drown
Think its a game
Think that I'm playin
Keep thinking your special
Special eds what I'm saying
And when my tongue gets to sprayin
In your face when you try me
Just know that I love you
But I don't approve bitch I'm Haile
These people think that 
I want them to love me 
no I want you to trust me 
when I tell you you ugly 
that you fucking disgust me 
there's no need to discuss me 
you want war we can do that 
don't need no still click clack 
one sec I'll be right back 
in your face you ain't no match 
I bet you need Jesus the 666 Beast 
so confess with thy tongue 
all your sins from your leash
and your tongue boy you dumb 
and my mouth is the gun 
you filthfricks are hideous 
Its over I won
you're a real what a real what 
keep running that shit 
better hope you don't die 
Cuz then it's off to hell bitch
